title: WeekView container component
description:
Create the main WeekView component at frontend/components/calendar/WeekView.tsx

## Visual Requirements (from mockup)
- 7-day grid layout (SUN-SAT)
- Weekend columns with bg-cream shading
- Today column with ring prominence
- Vertical month indicator on left ('AUGUST 2025')
- Left margin bullet indicators
- Notebook grid background

## Props Interface
```typescript
interface WeekViewProps {
  events: CalendarEvent[];
  weekStart: Date; // Sunday
  onEventClick: (event: CalendarEvent) => void;
  onEventHover?: (event: CalendarEvent | null) => void;
  focusedDay?: Date;
}
```

## Instrumentation
- results_viewed event on render

Reference: Spec Part 2, mockup screenshot

title: Page routing and layouts
description:
Set up Next.js App Router pages:

## Pages
- app/page.tsx - Discovery home (DiscoveryChat)
- app/week/page.tsx - Week view page
- app/share/[id]/page.tsx - Shareable calendar links

## Root Layout (app/layout.tsx)
- HTML/body setup
- Font loading (serif, sans, mono)
- Global styles import
- Metadata (title, description)

## Shared Layout
- Header component on all pages
- Footer (minimal for MVP)
- Notebook grid background pattern

Reference: Spec Part 4 File Structure

title: Initialize Next.js 14 app
description:
Set up the frontend foundation:

- Create Next.js 14 app with App Router in frontend/
- TypeScript configuration
- Install and configure Tailwind CSS
- Install shadcn/ui and initialize
- Set up Biome for linting
- Create basic folder structure per TECHSTACK.md:
  - app/ (pages)
  - components/ (ui, calendar, discovery, layout)
  - lib/ (utilities)
  - styles/ (globals.css)

Reference: TECHSTACK.md:49-74

title: ResultsPreview component
description:
Create ResultsPreview at frontend/components/discovery/ResultsPreview.tsx

## Visual Design
- Shows 3-5 event preview cards inline in chat
- Agent message: 'I found X events that match...'
- Compact event cards (smaller than WeekView cards)
- 'View full week' CTA button
- 'Want me to narrow it down?' option

## Behavior
- results_viewed instrumentation event (from: 'chat')
- Click event → event_clicked_out (source: 'chat_preview')
- 'View full week' → navigate to /week with filters

Reference: Spec Part 3 State 4

title: ChatInput and QuickPicks components
description:
Create input components for discovery:

## ChatInput (frontend/components/discovery/ChatInput.tsx)
- Full width input, 16px padding
- border-light, 4px radius
- Placeholder: 'Find AI meetups this weekend...' in text-secondary
- Submit on Enter or button click
- search_performed instrumentation event

## QuickPicks (frontend/components/discovery/QuickPicks.tsx)
- Row of chip buttons
- Default: bg-cream
- Hover: bg-accent-yellow
- 16px radius, 8px 16px padding
- Chips: [This weekend] [AI/Tech] [Startups] [Free events]
- Click updates input or triggers search

Reference: Spec Part 3

title: EventPeek hover tooltip
description:
Create EventPeek at frontend/components/calendar/EventPeek.tsx

## Visual Requirements
- Appears on card hover (300ms debounce)
- Shows: venue, neighborhood, RSVP link
- Positioned near card (tooltip style)
- Matches card aesthetic (white bg, shadow-md)

## Behavior
- calendar:event_hover instrumentation event
- Disappears on mouse leave
- Click-through to RSVP link

Reference: Spec Part 2 Interaction Requirements

title: Header and Hero layout components
description:
Create layout components:

## Header (frontend/components/layout/Header.tsx)
From mockup:
- Green rounded rectangle logo 'Calendar Club' (white text)
- Right side: LOGIN | SUBSCRIBE text links + hamburger menu
- White card container for buttons
- Clean, minimal styling

## Hero (frontend/components/layout/Hero.tsx)
From mockup:
- Orange dot accent (left of text)
- 'Tune into' - serif italic, ~48px, brand-green
- 'the signal.' - sans-serif bold, ~48px, text-primary
- Yellow highlight box below with tagline
- Tagline: monospace/typewriter, italic, uppercase tracking

## HighlightBox (frontend/components/layout/HighlightBox.tsx)
- Yellow (accent-yellow) background
- Subtle shadow
- Contains tagline text
- 'A curated directory of the best technical meetups. No noise, just deep cuts.'

Reference: Mockup screenshot, Spec Part 1

title: DiscoveryChat container
description:
Create DiscoveryChat at frontend/components/discovery/DiscoveryChat.tsx

## Chat Flow States
1. Initial Prompt - hero + input + quick picks + recent searches
2. Clarifying Questions - agent asks 2-4 questions via chips
3. Processing - skeleton loading, 'Searching through X events...'
4. Results Preview - 3-5 event cards inline, 'View full week' CTA
5. Week View Transition - navigate to WeekView with filters

## Visual Design
- Chat card: white bg, border-light, shadow-md, 12px radius
- Agent bubbles: brand-green left border
- User bubbles: accent-orange left border
- Notebook grid background visible

## Props
```typescript
interface DiscoveryChatProps {
  onSearch: (query: SearchQuery) => void;
  onResultsReady: (events: CalendarEvent[]) => void;
  initialQuery?: string;
}
```

Reference: Spec Part 3

title: WeekHeader and DayColumn components
description:
Create header and column components:

## WeekHeader (frontend/components/calendar/WeekHeader.tsx)
- Day labels: SUN, MON, TUE, WED, THU, FRI, SAT
- Sans-serif medium, 12px, uppercase, text-secondary
- Date numbers below: semibold, 20px
- Weekend dates (Sun/Sat) in accent-orange
- Weekday dates in text-primary
- Today indicator: orange dot in header

## DayColumn (frontend/components/calendar/DayColumn.tsx)
- Single day column container
- Weekend: bg-cream background
- Weekday: bg-white background
- Today: ring-1 ring-accent-orange
- Contains stacked EventCard components
- Handles event positioning

Reference: Spec Part 2, mockup screenshot

title: Configure design system tokens
description:
Implement the design system in Tailwind config:

## Colors (from spec + mockup)
- brand-green: #2D6A4F (logo, CTAs)
- accent-orange: #E76F51 (weekend dates, meetup tags)
- accent-yellow: #F4D35E (highlight boxes, tape accents)
- accent-teal: #2A9D8F (category tags)
- accent-blue: #457B9D (category tags)
- text-primary: #1D3557 (headings)
- text-secondary: #6B7280 (times, metadata)
- bg-cream: #FDFBF7 (page background)
- border-light: #E5E7EB (grid lines)

## Typography
- Serif italic for 'Tune into' hero
- Sans-serif bold for 'the signal.'
- Monospace/typewriter for tagline
- Uppercase tracking for day headers

## Visual Motifs
- Notebook grid pattern (radial-gradient dots)
- Tape/sticker aesthetic (rotated 'Starts Here!')
- Yellow highlight boxes with shadow

Reference: throughts/plans/2026-01-09-phase0-ux-spec.md Part 1

title: Phase 0 UX: Week View + Discovery Chat
description:
Implement the MVP frontend per throughts/plans/2026-01-09-phase0-ux-spec.md

## Scope
- Next.js 14 app initialization with Tailwind + shadcn/ui
- Design system (colors, typography, notebook grid pattern)
- WeekView component (7-day grid, event cards, hover peek)
- DiscoveryChat component (chat flow, clarifying questions)
- Layout (Header, Hero, page routing)
- Telemetry integration (HyperDX)

## Reference
- Spec: throughts/plans/2026-01-09-phase0-ux-spec.md
- Mockup: Screenshot 2026-01-09 at 11.16.31 AM.png
- Tech stack: TECHSTACK.md

title: API client for backend
Telemetry setup (HyperDX)
description:
Set up instrumentation at frontend/lib/telemetry.ts

## Required Events
- search_performed: query, parsedIntent, chips_used
- clarification_answered: question_type, answer, method
- results_viewed: count, latencyMs, from
- event_clicked_out: eventId, source, category
- calendar:event_hover: eventId, dayOfWeek

## Implementation
- HyperDX + OpenTelemetry integration
- Session UUID in localStorage (persists across visits)
- Event batching for performance
- Error boundary tracking

## Environment
- HYPERDX_API_KEY in .env.local

Reference: TECHSTACK.md:259-264, Spec instrumentation sections

title: ClarifyingQ component
description:
Create ClarifyingQ at frontend/components/discovery/ClarifyingQ.tsx

## Clarifying Questions Rubric
Agent asks up to 4 questions based on missing info:

| Missing | Question | Chips |
|---------|----------|-------|
| Time | 'When are you looking?' | [Today] [This weekend] [Next week] [Pick dates] |
| Category | 'What kind of events?' | [AI/Tech] [Startups] [Community] [All of the above] |
| Location | 'How far will you go?' | [Downtown only] [Within 15 min] [Anywhere in Columbus] |
| Cost | 'Free, paid, or both?' | [Free only] [Any price] |

## Behavior
- Questions appear as agent-style chat bubbles
- User can respond via chips OR free-form text
- After 2-3 answers, proceed with search
- clarification_answered instrumentation event

Reference: Spec Part 3 Clarifying Questions Rubric
